questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: I think, i'll give a part for caritatives associations, i'll give a part to my family, i'll give a part to my best friends who needs it, and finally i'll hold the last part ..for me sure!!! But i would not spend this money in stupid thinks!!
